participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and active, she enjoys engaging in sports and is always eager to learn new things.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is blue. i enjoy sports such as running. i'm married. i am a vegetarian.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Passionate and hands-on, he loves restoring vintage cars and is very dedicated to his hobbies.
participant_2.background: i have two dogs. i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i own two vintage mustangs.

content.text: it does not answer me sometimes
